title: Jester

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Full House**: Pick someone, They will be forced to attempt to use the same ability on the same target for the next night, you will learn who they targeted.
- **Hypnotize** (3x): Trick a player, Making them recieve a fake feedback message that they could recieve from an outside source, you will also learn their original feedback and feedback-less actions that affected them tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Your target will recieve that message as if it were part of their night feedback.
- You may multitask.

desc:
Post 3050
*"They carry cards with them, so they're always ready to play. But their habit of throwing cards means they never get to play with a full deck."*
